participant_1.background:
I'm so proud of being a vegan, and I would brag about it to my friends if I were famous.
I've lived in many places, but I grew up in a small town in the Midwest.
My favorite thing to do is watch TV and admire beautiful flowers.
i live on a pig farm.
i am fascinated with ghosts.

participant_2.background:
My dog helps me collect firewood for my cabin.
My parents are proud of me, even though they don't understand my job.
i am a model building enthusiast.
hotdogs are my favorite food.
i lived most of my life not knowing who bob marley was.

content.text: Hey, I'm from the Midwest too! How'd you like growing up there?
It was great! I loved the small town feel and the sense of community.
Me too! I miss that sometimes, but I've also enjoyed living in other places.
I've never lived anywhere else, but I've always wanted to travel.
You should! It's so much fun to see new places and meet new people.
I know, I know. I'm going to do it one day!
What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love watching TV, reading, and spending time with my family.
Me too! I'm also a big fan of animals.
Me too! I have a dog and a cat.
Oh, that's great! I love dogs.
Me too! They're the best.
I agree! What do you do for work?
I'm a model builder.
Wow, that's cool! I've never met a model builder before.
It's a lot of fun! I love creating things with my hands.
I can imagine! It sounds like you have a lot of hobbies.
I do! I like to keep busy.
Me too! I think it's important to have a lot of interests.
I agree! It makes life more fun
